BADNICK: ERROR: This nickname is already taken
NOID: ERROR: This gameID is not associated to a game!
WRONG_CHOSEN_TABLE_INDEX: ERROR: The index chosen is not valid
BADCOLUMN: ERROR: The column chosen does not have enough spaces to contain all the tiles
WRONGSTATE: ERROR: This action can not be perform in the current state of the game
NOTACTIVE: ERROR: You are not the active player
COLUMNDIFF: ERROR: During a turn, all tiles must be inserted in the same column
NOPLAYER: ERROR: The player you tried to send the message to either disconnected or does not exist
